snippet: A woman accused in the deaths of four children when oil ignited in a pan atop a stove at her home day care business in Houston was found guilty Tuesday on one count of felony murder.
abstract: Jessica Tata, woman accused in deaths of four children when cooking oil ignited at her home day care business in Houston, is found guilty on one count of felony murder
lead_paragraph: A woman accused in the deaths of four children when oil ignited in a pan atop a stove at her home day care business in Houston was found guilty Tuesday on one count of felony murder.

headline.main: Texas: Murder Verdict in Day Care Fire
headline.print_headline: Texas: Murder Verdict In Day Care Fire
